newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Corp. Express EPS view cut.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Corp. Express EPS view cut.

text.p: -- Alex. Brown said it lowered its fiscal 1997 earnings estimate for Corporate Express to $0.11 per share from $0.16, a reduction that cut the full-year estimate to $0.45 cents from $0.50 fiscal 1997. The fiscal year ended March 1.

-- The firm said it continues to rate the stock a strong buy, especially in light of the shares's severe decline in reaction to the company warning this morning about weaker-than-expected fiscal 1997 earnings.
-- In late Nasdaq trade Wednesday, the shares were off 8-3/16 to 10-1/8.
